info.name: ELIAN ► PLACES (Library) (FF)
info.description:
This style affect PLACES (library) and related...
...in Firefox 38; 41.0a2.
info.additionalInfo: (All appologies for my english) I hate light UIs. I REALLY HATE THEM. AFFECT: PLACES BOOKMARK SIDEBAR HISTORY SIDEBAR EDIT BOOKMARK PANEL BOOKMARK PROPERTIES DOWNLOADS DOWNLOADS PANEL NOTES: • CREATED in FF 41.0a2. (Almost every FF version change some code that breaks some things of this style. And cuz i DON'T update my FF version soon, you should be patient. VERY PATIENT) • I use Stylish version 1.4.3 only. • OS: Windows XP SP3 (Locale en) • I don't use Chrome. I like Opera, ussualy i don't use it too. • I use the DEFAULT THEME with DARK PERSONAS (Lightweight Themes). OR DEVELPER EDITION THEME. • There are some code that you could make better. (i'm a beginner, i'm try to learn.) • a comment? YES. Just be objetive, not subjetive. Remmember that THIS IS STYLISH, PLEASE. YOUR PREFERENCES ISN'T THE ONLY WAY THAT THE THINGS SHOULD BE. This is it! CHANGELOG: ► 2015-07-05 ►►► First Release.
